title: Cloudkill
content:
Cloudkill Level 5 Conjuration Spell 5~40 Damage 5d8 Poison Craft a large cloud that inflicts 5∼40 Poison damage per turn. You can reposition the cloud every turn. The cloud Heavily Obscures everything within it. 10 turn 18m CON Save Concentration Action Level 5 Spell Slot

Level 5 Conjuration Spell

Craft a large cloud that inflicts 5∼40 Poison damage per turn. You can reposition the cloud every turn.

The cloud Heavily Obscures everything within it.

18m CON Save Concentration
